ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 89
ygData.msgSnippet: You can t buy or trade jboots as far as I know.   Good for ya, if you can play late at night.  Im usually in bed early - you know - get early the next day to
ygData.messageBody:
You can't buy or trade jboots as far as I know. Good for ya, if you can
play late at night. Im usually in bed early - you know - get early the next
day to go to work

Well there must be a lot of dumb people playing EQ - because a lot of them
have been camping stuff for more than 20 hrs. for a single item.

Camp for hours for rubi (giggles) try weeks - Ive Known people in Cazic
that have been there over a month & they still don't have rubi. I gave up
on the PGT a long time ago - everytime I went there it was camped or if I
was there alone not long after other people would show up & stay - Im no
genius (well actually I am, oops sorry) but if they stay - I think they have
every intention of stealing the kill otherwise they wouldn't stick around
and argue with you that they've been wanting a PGT for months.

But you're right no more of this arguing - it is falling on deaf ears

-----Original Message-----
From: Justin Howard <mhoward1@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, August 14, 1999 7:33 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 89


>From: "Justin Howard" <mhoward1@...>
>
>this arguement though is just going to fall on deaf ears.. I for one can
>time a lot of spawns great... late at night I can come on for say 2 hours
>and totally rotate every npc spawn in for ex. upper guk (scyer, ancient
>croc, warden, squire, giant spider) <not the lord.. yet at least>... and I
>usually come away with at least one good item... now maybe I dont "NEED"
>this item but I do get some mighty nice items which are then used to trade
>for other stuff that I do need.
>
>So this dumb arguement about 20 hours being required for every single nice
>item is not a valid one. Yes for ruby you usually do have to camp for
hours
>unless your lucky but I have known a few people to get their lucky breaks
>(for ex. a friend of mine was camping the avatar of fear.. wasnt there for
>more then 15min, the avatar spawned.. and he was carrying a Ruby BP).
>
>
>Also, I think the point the guy was trying to make is "have fun" if your
not
>having fun then you shouldnt be playing? er better yet why are you playing
>if your not overall having fun?
>
>A sign of power in my book would be one that gets by without having to
whine
>24/7...
>=D
>
>ok lets get back on topic.. anyone know the ratio of times the Lord in
upper
>guk will be carrying the ghoulsbane as compared to the silvered bracer? heh
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Evelyne Parisien <hoosta@...>
>To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>Date: Saturday, August 14, 1999 6:33 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 89
>
>
>>From: "Evelyne Parisien" <hoosta@...>
>>
>>I guess you just proved our point - you will never get jboots, rubi &
stuff
>>NOT because you suck at playing or you have a lousy character but because
>>you just don't have the TIME for camping. Now thats just plain wrong. We
>>should be able to get stuff if we have good skills & high level characters
>>not because we are willing to sit in a specific area for over 20 hrs. to
>get
>>something really nice.
>>
>>If you're happy not getting any of those items that makes the game
better -
>>well good for you but I for one, am NOT.
>>
>>I don't know but for some of us - I know some of us in my guild feel that
>>way - that getting all this hot stuff is a sign of wealth, power,
>>achievement. Don't forget this is a role playing game - some of us take
>our
>>characters seriously & our guilds too. Each of us have different goals in
>>this game, I guess.
>>
>>But, If I can't get a BIB or whatever because I can't camp it for 20 hrs.
>or
>>whatever - that is totally wrong - I shouldn't be able to get that BIB
>>because Im a lousy player or because my character is not high enough to
>kill
>>it or something - now that I can live with it But when you're like level
>40
>>& you could kill that spawn in your sleep & get that item easily - since
>>you've worked hard to get to that level - some rewards should come with
>>being higher level - but you're 40 & you have no rubi, special weapons or
>>item because you don't have time or patience to camp but you will see a 15
>>level characters with all those - NOW that is DARN WRONG !!!!!
>>
>>Well Im happy you're having fun. Oh! by the way I played UO & I was
>>bitching & whining there too :o)
>>
>>BTW, Im 31 ranger & still dont' have rubi, PGT or BIBS or whatever - like
>>you camping 20 or 30 hrs. straight is not plausible for me either - has if
>>that was not enough - then you get casters who kill your monsters. Im a
>>very good player, have a good character - I should be able to get those
>>things but with the way the game is design - I guess only people who don't
>>work or kids especially if they are casters - can get ALL the good stuff.
>>Yeah you're right no big deal.. Who cares how strong my character gets
with
>>time - I'll still not be able to get those things by myself, yeah no big
>>deal
>>
>>
>>-----Original Message-----
>>From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>>To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>>Date: Saturday, August 14, 1999 2:23 PM
>>Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 89
>>
>>
>>>From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>>>
>>>I work 40 hours a week, have my own apartment, my own car, loan, bills, I
>>>go to night school aswell and I play maybe 2-3 hours a night....so about
>>>15 hours a week...
>>>
>>>That won't get me a pait of JBoots, or BIBS, or BIC...or any rubicite or
>>>anything....but you know what I do....I just enjoy the game. So WHAT if
>>>you can't have an item you want. Tough shit....really people....sure the
>>>item may be cool....but it's not the end all and be all of your
>>>character.....please.....quite bitching about camping. I don't camp,
>>>can't camp....and don't care if others do. If they want to stay up 18
>>>straight hours....then let them....this is a game after all....there are
>>>other things going on in the world.
>>>
>>>As far as items not being on a MoB all the time. Well...that would make
>>>SoW from a shaman or druid...not very special....that would make that
>>>special weapon not so special anymore. That would make the 10-40 hour
>>>wait to get the PGT that much less special. If you want to power through
>>>the game...get all the best weapons and armor easily and not have to work
>>>at all to get em....then go play UO. I don't want to see everyone
running
>>>around with JBoots...wielding PGT's and Darkewood shields....
>>>
>>> ~S
>>>
>>>p.s. power leveling, stupidity and camping will thin out rather
>>>soon....seeing as highschool/college are starting rather soon.....relax
>>>people....plenty of items in the game that we know of....and plenty more
>>>that we don't know about.
>>>
>>>
>>>
>>>
